page.title: 19HAWICK YOUTH CENTRE.
page.content: The Hawick Youth Centre was built in l968 and opened in l969. You have to be between lO to l3 to be a junior member and l4 years upwards to be a senior member of the Centre. In the winter more people use the Centre than in the summer. About 3OO people use the Centre a year. It is open 5O weeks a year and 7 days a week. They have facilities to play football, snooker, Pool, table tennis, darts and to practise sports like Judo. There are also an assortment of table games like cards, chess and dominoes which members can book. As well as these games there is a bar for older members of the Centre. The Youth Centre has changed slightly over the years but still fulfils a useful function in Hawick. It gives the local youths the opportunity to fill their spare time constructively.
